mapper.insert: insert into t_envelope (envelope_id, uid, `value`, snatch_time) values (#{envelopeId}, #{uid}, #{value}, #{snatchTime})
mapper.select: select envelope_id as envelopeId, case opened when 0 then null else value end as value, opened as opened, snatch_time as snatchTime from t_envelope where uid = #{uid} order by snatch_time
